import React from 'react' import allblog from '../blogdata/blog.json' import { useParams } from 'react-router' // export default BlogDetailsPage = () => { export default function BlogDetailsPage() { var { slugpath } = useParams(), post = findPostBySlug(slugpath); console.log(post) const {blogCategory,blogTitle,slug,postedOn,author,blogImage,blogText} = post return (
{/* */}

{blogTitle}

We offer a great place to work for all our associates by providing the best facilities,
rewards & growth programs on a continual basis to support both, your personal and professional growth.

{post.blogCategory}

{blogTitle}

posted on {postedOn} by {author}

{blogText}

Magna odio tempus commodo

In arcu accumsan arcu adipiscing accumsan orci ac. Felis id enim aliquet. Accumsan ac integer lobortis commodo ornare aliquet accumsan erat tempus amet porttitor. Ante commodo blandit adipiscing integer semper orci eget. Faucibus commodo adipiscing mi eu nullam accumsan morbi arcu ornare odio mi adipiscing nascetur lacus ac interdum morbi accumsan vis mi accumsan ac praesent.

) } function findPostBySlug(slug) { return allblog.data.find(myslug => myslug.slugpath === slug); }
